honors_and_awards.title: 40 under 40 Data Scientists, India for 2019
honors_and_awards.description: India’s largest machine learning conference MLDS 2019 which brought 690+ delegates on a single platform announced the winners of 40 Under 40 awards — recognizing India’s leading data scientists and their contribution to the data science industry.
